name: LAPORAN KINERJA KERANI, MANDOR, DAN ASISTEN - Multi-Estate
description: Template laporan verifikasi transaksi FFB scanner multi-estate dengan analisis kinerja karyawan lengkap termasuk logika verifikasi, query SQL, dan perhitungan detail

business_context.purpose: Memantau kinerja data entry karyawan (Kerani, Mandor, Asisten) pada sistem FFB scanner untuk memastikan akurasi dan verifikasi transaksi panen kelapa sawit

key_concepts.TRANSNO: Nomor transaksi unik yang menjadi acuan verifikasi
key_concepts.RECORDTAG: Kode role karyawan: PM=Kerani (Scanner), P1=Asisten, P5=Mandor
key_concepts.verifikasi_logic: Transaksi dianggap verified jika ada duplikat TRANSNO dengan RECORDTAG berbeda (PM + P1/P5)
business_rules: Setiap transaksi Kerani (PM) harus diverifikasi oleh Mandor (P5) atau Asisten (P1)
Verifikasi terjadi ketika ada duplikat TRANSNO dengan RECORDTAG yang berbeda
Perbedaan input data antara Kerani dan verifikator menunjukkan potensi error
Filter TRANSSTATUS 704 digunakan untuk bulan Mei karena adanya perubahan sistem

stakeholders: Estate Manager - untuk monitoring kinerja karyawan
Quality Assurance - untuk validasi data entry

parameters.name: USE_STATUS_704_FILTER
parameters.description: Gunakan filter khusus TRANSSTATUS 704 untuk bulan Mei

FFBSCANNERDATA{MM}.description: Monthly transaction table for FFB scanner data

key_fields.TRANSNO: Transaction number - used for duplicate detection and verification
key_fields.SCANUSERID: Employee ID who scanned the transaction
key_fields.FIELDID: Field identifier linked to OCFIELD table
key_fields.TRANSSTATUS: Transaction status (704 used for May filtering)

FFBSCANNERDATA{MM}.data_flow: Data flows from Kerani input (PM) ‚Üí Mandor/Asisten verification (P1/P5) ‚Üí System processing

OCFIELD.description: Field reference table containing field information and division mapping

key_fields.DIVID: Division identifier linked to CRDIVISION table

OCFIELD.purpose: Maps transactions to specific divisions for estate-level reporting

CRDIVISION.description: Division reference table containing division names and details
CRDIVISION.purpose: Provides human-readable division names for reporting

EMP.description: Employee reference table for mapping employee IDs to names
EMP.purpose: Provides human-readable employee names for reporting

monthly_tables.table_detection: System automatically detects which monthly tables exist for given date range
monthly_tables.data_consistency: Each monthly table contains data for specific month with consistent schema
monthly_tables.query_scope: Multiple monthly tables may be queried for date ranges spanning multiple months

employee_mapping.description: Retrieve mapping between employee IDs and their names for human-readable reporting
employee_mapping.query: SELECT ID, NAME FROM EMP ORDER BY NAME
employee_mapping.business_purpose: Convert employee IDs (SCANUSERID) to employee names in reports
employee_mapping.expected_output: List of all employees with their IDs and names

monthly_table_detection.description: Dynamic detection of available monthly tables within date range
monthly_table_detection.query_logic: SELECT TABLE_NAME FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_NAME LIKE 'FFBSCANNERDATA%'
monthly_table_detection.business_purpose: Determine which monthly tables contain data for the selected period
monthly_table_detection.implementation: System generates table names based on date range: FFBSCANNERDATA01 through FFBSCANNERDATA12

divisions.description: Get all active divisions that have transactions within the selected period
divisions.query: SELECT DISTINCT b.DIVID, c.DIVNAME FROM FFBSCANNERDATA${MONTH} a JOIN OCFIELD b ON a.FIELDID = b.ID LEFT JOIN CRDIVISION c ON b.DIVID = c.ID WHERE b.DIVID IS NOT NULL AND c.DIVNAME IS NOT NULL AND a.TRANSDATE BETWEEN '${START_DATE}' AND '${END_DATE}'
divisions.business_purpose: Identify divisions to be included in estate-level analysis
divisions.filtering: Only includes divisions with actual transactions in the period
divisions.expected_output: Unique list of division IDs and names with transaction activity

main_analysis.description: Core transaction data query for verification analysis
main_analysis.query: SELECT a.ID, a.SCANUSERID, a.OCID, a.WORKERID, a.CARRIERID, a.FIELDID, a.TASKNO, a.RIPEBCH, a.UNRIPEBCH, a.BLACKBCH, a.ROTTENBCH, a.LONGSTALKBCH, a.RATDMGBCH, a.LOOSEFRUIT, a.TRANSNO, a.TRANSDATE, a.TRANSTIME, a.UPLOADDATETIME, a.RECORDTAG, a.TRANSSTATUS, a.TRANSTYPE, a.LASTUSER, a.LASTUPDATED, a.OVERRIPEBCH, a.UNDERRIPEBCH, a.ABNORMALBCH, a.LOOSEFRUIT2, b.DIVID, c.DIVNAME FROM FFBSCANNERDATA${MONTH} a JOIN OCFIELD b ON a.FIELDID = b.ID LEFT JOIN CRDIVISION c ON b.DIVID = c.ID WHERE b.DIVID = '${DIV_ID}' AND a.TRANSDATE BETWEEN '${START_DATE}' AND '${END_DATE}'
main_analysis.business_purpose: Extract all transaction data needed for verification analysis
key_fields: TRANSNO - for duplicate detection and verification logic
RIPEBCH, UNRIPEBCH, etc. - for input difference calculation
main_analysis.filtering: Filtered by division and date range
main_analysis.data_scope: All fields needed for verification analysis and difference calculation

data_processing.algorithm_overview: Multi-step analysis process that identifies verification patterns, calculates performance metrics, and detects input differences between Kerani and verifiers

steps.name: Data Collection and Preprocessing
steps.description: Collect all FFB transaction data for selected estates and period with proper data validation
substeps: Execute main analysis query for each division
Combine data from multiple monthly tables
steps.error_handling: Continue processing if individual monthly tables fail, log warnings for missing tables

steps.name: Duplicate Detection and Verification Logic
steps.description: Identify duplicate transactions by TRANSNO to determine verified transactions

algorithm.verification_definition: Transaction is considered verified when TRANSNO appears with different RECORDTAG values
algorithm.verified_condition: PM (Kerani) + P1/P5 (Mandor/Asisten) transactions with same TRANSNO
algorithm.priority_order: P1 (Asisten) takes priority over P5 (Mandor) when both exist for same TRANSNO

steps.output: Set of verified TRANSNO values for difference calculation

steps.name: Employee Performance Calculation
steps.description: Calculate transaction counts and verification rates for each employee role

kerani_metrics.total_transactions: Count of all PM transactions for employee
kerani_metrics.verified_transactions: Count of PM transactions with TRANSNO in verified set
kerani_metrics.difference_count: Count of verified transactions with field differences

mandor_metrics.total_transactions: Count of all P5 transactions for employee

asisten_metrics.total_transactions: Count of all P1 transactions for employee

steps.name: Input Difference Analysis
steps.description: Calculate field differences between Kerani input and verifier transactions

comparison_logic.scope: Only verified transactions (PM with corresponding P1/P5)
comparison_logic.difference_calculation: For each field: compare Kerani value vs Verifier value
comparison_logic.difference_criteria: Any field difference counts as 1 transaction difference (not per-field)
comparison_logic.data_conversion: Convert to float for comparison, treat null/empty as 0

status_704_filter.purpose: Special filtering for May 2024 due to system changes
status_704_filter.condition: Enabled when USE_STATUS_704_FILTER = True and date range includes May
status_704_filter.filter_logic: Only count differences when verifier (P1/P5) transactions have TRANSSTATUS = 704
status_704_filter.rationale: System update in May caused transaction status variations

output_metrics.differences_per_employee: Number of verified transactions with input differences

steps.name: Aggregation and Summary Generation
steps.description: Aggregate results across employees, divisions, and estates with summary statistics
aggregation_levels: Division level - totals and averages per division
Multi-estate level - grand totals across all selected estates

summary_calculations.total_verified: Sum of all verified Kerani transactions

business_rules: Every Kerani (PM) transaction should be verified by Mandor (P5) or Asisten (P1)
Verification occurs when same TRANSNO exists with different RECORDTAG
Input differences indicate potential data entry errors
Higher verification rates indicate better data quality
Lower difference rates indicate better data accuracy

duplicate_detection.verified_condition: PM + P1/P5 transactions with same TRANSNO
duplicate_detection.algorithm: pandas.duplicated() with keep=False to get all duplicates

difference_fields.RIPEBCH: Ripe bunch count - primary productivity indicator
difference_fields.BLACKBCH: Black bunch count - quality issue indicator
difference_fields.ROTTENBCH: Rotten bunch count - quality issue indicator
difference_fields.LONGSTALKBCH: Long stalk bunch count - harvesting quality
difference_fields.RATDMGBCH: Rat damaged bunch count - pest damage indicator

status_704_filter.filter_logic: Only count differences when Mandor/Asisten transactions have TRANSSTATUS = 704
status_704_filter.business_context: System implementation change in May 2024 required special handling
status_704_filter.implementation: Apply filter only to verification transactions (P1/P5), not Kerani (PM)

participation_rate.description: Percentage of Kerani transactions that are verified

division_kpi.data_quality_score: Combined measure of verification and accuracy

explanations.title: PENJELASAN LAPORAN KINERJA
items: KERANI: % transaksi yang sudah diverifikasi (ada duplikat TRANSNO dengan P1/P5) dari total yang ia buat. Angka dalam kurung menunjukkan jumlah transaksi terverifikasi.
MANDOR/ASISTEN: % transaksi yang ia buat per total Kerani di divisi tersebut (warna hijau).
SUMMARY: % verifikasi keseluruhan divisi (Total Transaksi Kerani Terverifikasi / Total Transaksi Kerani). Angka dalam kurung menunjukkan jumlah transaksi Kerani yang terverifikasi.
GRAND TOTAL: % verifikasi keseluruhan untuk semua estate yang dipilih (Total Semua Transaksi Kerani Terverifikasi / Total Semua Transaksi Kerani).
Jumlah Transaksi: Untuk SUMMARY dan GRAND TOTAL hanya menghitung transaksi Kerani (tanpa Asisten/Mandor).

explanations.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è KETERANGAN PERBEDAAN INPUT (INDIKATOR KINERJA)
items: Metodologi: Untuk setiap transaksi KERANI yang terverifikasi, sistem menghitung jumlah field yang berbeda antara input KERANI dan input MANDOR/ASISTEN.
Field yang dibandingkan: RIPEBCH, UNRIPEBCH, BLACKBCH, ROTTENBCH, LONGSTALKBCH, RATDMGBCH, LOOSEFRUIT.
Format: 'X perbedaan (Y%)' dimana Y% = (X perbedaan / Jumlah transaksi terverifikasi) √ó 100.
Interpretasi: Semakin banyak perbedaan, semakin besar kemungkinan ada ketidakakuratan dalam input data.
